remarks: The property of being an undirected hypergraph represented by a class. This representation is useful if the set of vertices and the edge function is/needs not to be known.  (Contributed by AV, 1-Jan-2020.)
statement: uhgrac $p |- ( G e. UHGrph -> ( 2nd ` G ) : dom ( 2nd ` G ) --> ( ~P ( 1st ` G ) \ { (/) } ) ) $.
